abstract: A class that provices cellular service predictions about upcoming events and anomalies.
overview:
## Overview

To receive predictions about changing cellular conditions, start by initializing and retaining an instance of this class. Next, iterate over the [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePredictionProvider/servicePredictions] asynchronous sequence with a `for`-`await`-`in` loop.

Each time your loop receives updated [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePrediction] instances, you can inspect their [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePrediction/predictedStartTime], [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePrediction/predictedInterval], and [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePrediction/impact-swift.property] properties to determine if your app needs to take action in advance of a potentially disruptive event.

While processing predictions from the [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePredictionProvider/servicePredictions] sequence, gracefully handle any errors that it throws. The [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePredictionError/unsupportedDevice] error indicates that WirelessInsights won’t provide any predictions on this device. However, other errors indicate recoverable failures, such as [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePredictionError/connectionError].

The following example shows a class that creates a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Task] to receive service predictions and call a private helper method when it receives a sufficiently important prediction.

items.description: An asychronous sequence of current predictions.
items.name: servicePredictions

items.description: An individual prediction of anticipated cellular network availability.
items.name: ServicePrediction

items.description: A type that represents errors encountered while using the WirelessInsights framework.
items.name: ServicePredictionError

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app can use the WirelessInsights framework to obtain wireless service predictions.
items.name: Wireless Insights Service Predictions

title: ServicePredictionProvider
